  • Deprecated Interfaces 
    Interface and Description
    xyz.morphia.mapping.lazy.DatastoreProvider
    DatastoreProviders are no longer necessary
    xyz.morphia.logging.Logr
    Use Logger directly
    xyz.morphia.logging.LogrFactory
    Use LoggerFactory directly
  • Deprecated Classes 
    Class and Description
    xyz.morphia.DAO
    use xyz.morphia.dao.BasicDAO
    xyz.morphia.DatastoreImpl
    This is an internal implementation of a published API. No public alternative planned.
    xyz.morphia.MapReduceOptions
    This feature will not be supported in 2.0
    xyz.morphia.MapreduceResults
    This feature will not be supported in 2.0
    xyz.morphia.query.MorphiaIterator
    this is being replaced by MongoCursor
    xyz.morphia.query.MorphiaKeyIterator
    this is being replaced by MongoCursor
    xyz.morphia.aggregation.Sort
    Use Sort instead.
  • Deprecated Enums 
    Enum and Description
    xyz.morphia.MapreduceType
    use MapReduceCommand.OutputType instead
  • Deprecated Annotation Types 
    Annotation Type and Description
    xyz.morphia.annotations.Polymorphic
    Currently unused
  • Deprecated Fields 
    Field and Description
    xyz.morphia.dao.BasicDAO.ds
    use BasicDAO.getDatastore()
    xyz.morphia.dao.BasicDAO.entityClazz
    use BasicDAO.getEntityClass()
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    xyz.morphia.query.UpdateOpsImpl.add(String, Object)
    xyz.morphia.query.UpdateOperations.add(String, Object)
    use UpdateOperations.addToSet(String, Object) instead
    xyz.morphia.query.UpdateOpsImpl.add(String, Object, boolean)
    xyz.morphia.query.UpdateOperations.add(String, Object, boolean)
    use UpdateOperations.push(String, Object) if addDups is false or UpdateOperations.addToSet(String, Object) instead
    xyz.morphia.query.UpdateOpsImpl.addAll(String, List<?>, boolean)
    xyz.morphia.query.UpdateOperations.addAll(String, List<?>, boolean)
    use UpdateOperations.push(String, List) if addDups is false or UpdateOperations.addToSet(String, List)
    xyz.morphia.aggregation.Sort.ascending(String)
    Use Sort.ascending(String) instead.
    xyz.morphia.query.QueryResults.asKeyList()
    use QueryResults.keys()
    xyz.morphia.query.QueryResults.asKeyList(FindOptions)
    use QueryResults.keys(FindOptions)
    xyz.morphia.query.QueryResults.asList()
    use QueryResults.find(FindOptions)
    xyz.morphia.query.QueryResults.asList(FindOptions)
    use QueryResults.find(FindOptions)
    xyz.morphia.query.Query.batchSize(int)
    use the methods that accept Options directly
    xyz.morphia.query.QueryImpl.batchSize(int)
    xyz.morphia.query.Query.comment(String)
    use the methods that accept Options directly. This can be replicated with options.modifier("$comment", comment)
    xyz.morphia.query.QueryImpl.comment(String)
    xyz.morphia.DatastoreImpl.copy(String)
    use Morphia.createDatastore(MongoClient, Mapper, String)
    xyz.morphia.query.QueryResults.countAll()
    use QueryResults.count() instead
    xyz.morphia.query.QueryImpl.countAll()
    xyz.morphia.mapping.DefaultCreator.createInst(Class<T>)
    use DefaultCreator.createInstance(Class) instead
    xyz.morphia.DatastoreImpl.delete(Class<T>, V, WriteConcern)
    use DatastoreImpl.delete(Class, Object, DeleteOptions)
    xyz.morphia.Datastore.delete(Query<T>, WriteConcern)
    use Datastore.delete(Query, DeleteOptions) instead
    xyz.morphia.DatastoreImpl.delete(Query<T>, WriteConcern)
    xyz.morphia.AdvancedDatastore.delete(String, Class<T>, V, WriteConcern)
    use Datastore.delete(Class, Object, DeleteOptions)
    xyz.morphia.DatastoreImpl.delete(String, Class<T>, V, WriteConcern)
    xyz.morphia.Datastore.delete(T, WriteConcern)
    use Datastore.delete(Query, DeleteOptions)
    xyz.morphia.DatastoreImpl.delete(T, WriteConcern)
    xyz.morphia.aggregation.Sort.descending(String)
    Use Sort.descending(String) instead.
    xyz.morphia.query.Query.disableCursorTimeout()
    use the methods that accept Options directly
    xyz.morphia.query.QueryImpl.disableCursorTimeout()
    xyz.morphia.query.Query.disableSnapshotMode()
    use the methods that accept Options directly. This can be replicated using options.modifier("$snapshot", false)
    xyz.morphia.query.QueryImpl.disableSnapshotMode()
    xyz.morphia.query.FieldEndImpl.doesNotHaveThisElement(Object)
    xyz.morphia.query.FieldEnd.doesNotHaveThisElement(Object)
    use FieldEnd.elemMatch(Query) instead
    xyz.morphia.query.Query.enableCursorTimeout()
    use the methods that accept Options directly
    xyz.morphia.query.QueryImpl.enableCursorTimeout()
    xyz.morphia.query.Query.enableSnapshotMode()
    use the methods that accept Options directly. This can be replicated using options.modifier("$snapshot", true)
    xyz.morphia.query.QueryImpl.enableSnapshotMode()
    xyz.morphia.Datastore.ensureIndex(Class<T>, String)
    This method uses the legacy approach for defining indexes. Switch to using annotations on entity classes or the methods in the Java driver itself.
    xyz.morphia.DatastoreImpl.ensureIndex(Class<T>, String)
    xyz.morphia.Datastore.ensureIndex(Class<T>, String, String, boolean, boolean)
    This method uses the legacy approach for defining indexes. Switch to using annotations on entity classes or the methods in the Java driver itself.
    xyz.morphia.DatastoreImpl.ensureIndex(Class<T>, String, String, boolean, boolean)
    xyz.morphia.AdvancedDatastore.ensureIndex(String, Class<T>, String)
    This method uses the legacy approach for defining indexes. Switch to using annotations on entity classes or the methods in the Java driver itself.
    xyz.morphia.DatastoreImpl.ensureIndex(String, Class<T>, String)
    xyz.morphia.AdvancedDatastore.ensureIndex(String, Class<T>, String, String, boolean, boolean)
    This method uses the legacy approach for defining indexes. Switch to using annotations on entity classes or the methods in the Java driver itself.
    xyz.morphia.DatastoreImpl.ensureIndex(String, Class<T>, String, String, boolean, boolean)
    xyz.morphia.query.QueryResults.fetch()
    use QueryResults.find(FindOptions) instead
    xyz.morphia.query.QueryResults.fetch(FindOptions)
    use QueryResults.find(FindOptions) instead
    xyz.morphia.query.QueryResults.fetchEmptyEntities()
    use QueryResults.keys() instead
    xyz.morphia.query.QueryResults.fetchEmptyEntities(FindOptions)
    use QueryResults.keys(FindOptions) instead
    xyz.morphia.query.QueryResults.fetchKeys()
    use QueryResults.keys()
    xyz.morphia.query.QueryResults.fetchKeys(FindOptions)
    use QueryResults.keys(FindOptions)
    xyz.morphia.Datastore.find(Class<T>, String, V)
    use FindOptions when running the query instead
    xyz.morphia.DatastoreImpl.find(Class<T>, String, V)
    xyz.morphia.Datastore.find(Class<T>, String, V, int, int)
    use FindOptions when running the query instead
    xyz.morphia.DatastoreImpl.find(Class<T>, String, V, int, int)
    xyz.morphia.Datastore.findAndModify(Query<T>, UpdateOperations<T>, boolean)
    use Datastore.findAndModify(Query, UpdateOperations, FindAndModifyOptions)
    xyz.morphia.DatastoreImpl.findAndModify(Query<T>, UpdateOperations<T>, boolean)
    xyz.morphia.Datastore.findAndModify(Query<T>, UpdateOperations<T>, boolean, boolean)
    use Datastore.findAndModify(Query, UpdateOperations, FindAndModifyOptions)
    xyz.morphia.DatastoreImpl.findAndModify(Query<T>, UpdateOperations<T>, boolean, boolean)
    xyz.morphia.query.QueryResults.get()
    use QueryResults.find() and MongoCursor.hasNext() or MongoCursor.tryNext()
    xyz.morphia.query.QueryResults.get(FindOptions)
    use QueryResults.find() and MongoCursor.hasNext() or MongoCursor.tryNext()
    xyz.morphia.query.Query.getBatchSize()
    use the methods that accept Options directly
    xyz.morphia.query.QueryImpl.getBatchSize()
    xyz.morphia.query.Query.getCollection()
    This is an internal method and subject to change or removal. Do not use.
    xyz.morphia.query.QueryImpl.getCollection()
    xyz.morphia.DatastoreImpl.getCollection(Object)
    this is an internal method. no replacement is planned.
    xyz.morphia.query.QueryImpl.getDatastore()
    this is an internal method that exposes an internal type and will likely go away soon
    xyz.morphia.mapping.MapperOptions.getDatastoreProvider()
    unused
    xyz.morphia.Datastore.getDB()
    use #getDatabase(). In general, should you need a DB reference, please use the MongoClient used to create this Datastore to retrieve it.
    xyz.morphia.aggregation.Sort.getDirection()
    Use Sort.getOrder() instead.
    xyz.morphia.dao.BasicDAO.getDs()
    use BasicDAO.getDatastore()
    xyz.morphia.dao.BasicDAO.getEntityClazz()
    use BasicDAO.getEntityClass() instead
    xyz.morphia.MapreduceResults.getError()
    xyz.morphia.aggregation.Accumulator.getField()
    use Accumulator.getValue()
    xyz.morphia.query.Query.getFieldsObject()
    This is an internal method and subject to change or removal. Do not use.
    xyz.morphia.query.QueryImpl.getFieldsObject()
    xyz.morphia.DatastoreImpl.getId(Object)
    xyz.morphia.query.QueryResults.getKey()
    use QueryResults.find() and MongoCursor.hasNext() or MongoCursor.tryNext()
    xyz.morphia.query.QueryResults.getKey(FindOptions)
    use QueryResults.find(FindOptions) and MongoCursor.hasNext() or MongoCursor.tryNext()
    xyz.morphia.DatastoreImpl.getKey(T)
    xyz.morphia.query.Query.getLimit()
    use the methods that accept Options directly
    xyz.morphia.query.QueryImpl.getLimit()
    xyz.morphia.query.Query.getOffset()
    use the methods that accept Options directly
    xyz.morphia.query.QueryImpl.getOffset()
    xyz.morphia.query.Query.getQueryObject()
    This is an internal method and subject to change or removal. Do not use.
    xyz.morphia.query.QueryImpl.getQueryObject()
    xyz.morphia.query.Query.getSortObject()
    This is an internal method and subject to change or removal. Do not use.
    xyz.morphia.query.QueryImpl.getSortObject()
    xyz.morphia.converters.TypeConverter.getSupportTypes()
    use #getSupportedTypes()
    xyz.morphia.MapreduceResults.getType()
    use MapreduceResults.getOutputType() instead
    xyz.morphia.aggregation.GeoNear.getUniqueDocuments()
    since version MongoDB 2.6: Geospatial queries no longer return duplicate results. The $uniqueDocs operator has no impact on results.
    xyz.morphia.Morphia.getUseBulkWriteOperations() 
    xyz.morphia.query.FieldEndImpl.hasThisElement(Object)
    xyz.morphia.query.FieldEnd.hasThisElement(Object)
    use FieldEnd.elemMatch(Query) instead
    xyz.morphia.query.Query.hintIndex(String)
    use the methods that accept Options directly. This can be replicated with options.modifier("$hint", idxName)
    xyz.morphia.query.QueryImpl.hintIndex(String)
    xyz.morphia.AdvancedDatastore.insert(Iterable<T>, WriteConcern)
    use AdvancedDatastore.insert(Iterable, InsertOptions)
    xyz.morphia.DatastoreImpl.insert(String, Iterable<T>, InsertOptions)
    xyz.morphia.AdvancedDatastore.insert(String, Iterable<T>, WriteConcern)
    use AdvancedDatastore.insert(String, Iterable, InsertOptions) instead
    xyz.morphia.DatastoreImpl.insert(String, Iterable<T>, WriteConcern)
    xyz.morphia.AdvancedDatastore.insert(T...)
    use AdvancedDatastore.insert(Iterable) instead
    xyz.morphia.DatastoreImpl.insert(T...)
    xyz.morphia.AdvancedDatastore.insert(T, WriteConcern)
    use AdvancedDatastore.insert(Object, InsertOptions)
    xyz.morphia.mapping.MapperOptions.isActLikeSerializer()
    this is actually the default and proper behavior. this setting is redundant
    xyz.morphia.MapreduceResults.isOk()
    xyz.morphia.Morphia.isUseBulkWriteOperations() 
    xyz.morphia.query.Query.limit(int)
    use the methods that accept Options directly
    xyz.morphia.query.QueryImpl.limit(int)
    xyz.morphia.query.Query.lowerIndexBound(DBObject)
    use the methods that accept Options directly. This can be replicated using options.modifier("$min", new Document(...))
    xyz.morphia.query.QueryImpl.lowerIndexBound(DBObject)
    xyz.morphia.Datastore.mapReduce(MapReduceOptions<T>)
    This feature will not be supported in 2.0
    xyz.morphia.Datastore.mapReduce(MapreduceType, Query, Class<T>, MapReduceCommand)
    use Datastore.mapReduce(MapReduceOptions) instead
    xyz.morphia.DatastoreImpl.mapReduce(MapreduceType, Query, Class<T>, MapReduceCommand)
    xyz.morphia.Datastore.mapReduce(MapreduceType, Query, String, String, String, Map<String, Object>, Class<T>)
    use Datastore.mapReduce(MapReduceOptions) instead
    xyz.morphia.DatastoreImpl.mapReduce(MapreduceType, Query, String, String, String, Map<String, Object>, Class<T>)
    xyz.morphia.query.Query.maxScan(int)
    use the methods that accept Options directly. This can be replicated using options.modifier("$maxScan", value)
    xyz.morphia.query.QueryImpl.maxScan(int)
    xyz.morphia.query.Query.maxTime(long, TimeUnit)
    use the methods that accept Options directly. This can be replicated using options.modifier("$maxTimeMS", MILLISECONDS.convert(value, unit))
    xyz.morphia.query.QueryImpl.maxTime(long, TimeUnit)
    xyz.morphia.query.Query.offset(int)
    use the methods that accept Options directly
    xyz.morphia.query.QueryImpl.offset(int)
    xyz.morphia.query.QueryImpl.parseFieldsString(String, Class, Mapper, boolean)
    this is an internal method and will be removed in the next version
    xyz.morphia.query.QueryImpl.prepareCursor()
    this is an internal method. no replacement is planned.
    xyz.morphia.query.Query.queryNonPrimary()
    use the methods that accept Options directly
    xyz.morphia.query.QueryImpl.queryNonPrimary()
    xyz.morphia.query.Query.queryPrimaryOnly()
    use the methods that accept Options directly.
    xyz.morphia.query.QueryImpl.queryPrimaryOnly()
    xyz.morphia.query.Query.retrievedFields(boolean, String...)
    use Query.project(String, boolean) instead
    xyz.morphia.query.QueryImpl.retrievedFields(boolean, String...)
    xyz.morphia.query.Query.returnKey()
    use the methods that accept Options directly. This can be replicated using options.modifier("$returnKey", true)
    xyz.morphia.query.QueryImpl.returnKey()
    xyz.morphia.Datastore.save(Iterable<T>, WriteConcern)
    use Datastore.save(Iterable, InsertOptions) instead
    xyz.morphia.AdvancedDatastore.save(String, T, WriteConcern)
    use AdvancedDatastore.save(String, Object, InsertOptions) instead
    xyz.morphia.Datastore.save(T...)
    use Datastore.save(Iterable, InsertOptions) instead
    xyz.morphia.DatastoreImpl.save(T...)
    xyz.morphia.Datastore.save(T, WriteConcern)
    use Datastore.save(Object, InsertOptions) instead
    xyz.morphia.DatastoreImpl.save(T, WriteConcern)
    xyz.morphia.mapping.MapperOptions.setActLikeSerializer(boolean)
    this is actually the default and proper behavior. this setting is redundant
    xyz.morphia.mapping.MapperOptions.setDatastoreProvider(DatastoreProvider)
    unused
    xyz.morphia.converters.TypeConverter.setSupportTypes(Class[])
    use #setSupportedTypes(Class[])
    xyz.morphia.aggregation.GeoNear.GeoNearBuilder.setUniqueDocuments(Boolean)
    Deprecated since server version 2.6: Geospatial queries no longer return duplicate results. The $uniqueDocs operator has no impact on results.
    xyz.morphia.Morphia.setUseBulkWriteOperations(boolean)
    Setting this value has no value functionally or performance-wise.
    xyz.morphia.query.QueryResults.tail()
    set the CursorType on FindOptions and use QueryResults.find(FindOptions) instead
    xyz.morphia.query.QueryImpl.tail()
    xyz.morphia.query.QueryResults.tail(boolean)
    set the CursorType on FindOptions and use QueryResults.find(FindOptions) instead. This can be replicated using findOptions.cursorType (awaitData ? TailableAwait : Tailable)
    xyz.morphia.query.QueryImpl.tail(boolean)
    xyz.morphia.Datastore.update(Query<T>, UpdateOperations<T>, boolean)
    use Datastore.update(Query, UpdateOperations, UpdateOptions) with upsert set to the value of createIfMissing
    xyz.morphia.DatastoreImpl.update(Query<T>, UpdateOperations<T>, boolean)
    xyz.morphia.Datastore.update(Query<T>, UpdateOperations<T>, boolean, WriteConcern)
    use Datastore.update(Query, UpdateOperations, UpdateOptions) with upsert set to the value of createIfMissing
    xyz.morphia.DatastoreImpl.update(Query<T>, UpdateOperations<T>, boolean, WriteConcern)
    xyz.morphia.Datastore.updateFirst(Query<T>, T, boolean)
    use Datastore.find(Class) and Datastore.save(Object) directly
    xyz.morphia.DatastoreImpl.updateFirst(Query<T>, T, boolean)
    xyz.morphia.Datastore.updateFirst(Query<T>, UpdateOperations<T>)
    use Datastore.update(Query, UpdateOperations, UpdateOptions) with multi set to false (the default value)
    xyz.morphia.DatastoreImpl.updateFirst(Query<T>, UpdateOperations<T>)
    xyz.morphia.Datastore.updateFirst(Query<T>, UpdateOperations<T>, boolean)
    use Datastore.update(Query, UpdateOperations, UpdateOptions) with upsert set to the value of createIfMissing
    xyz.morphia.DatastoreImpl.updateFirst(Query<T>, UpdateOperations<T>, boolean)
    xyz.morphia.Datastore.updateFirst(Query<T>, UpdateOperations<T>, boolean, WriteConcern)
    use Datastore.update(Query, UpdateOperations, UpdateOptions) with upsert set to the value of createIfMissing
    xyz.morphia.DatastoreImpl.updateFirst(Query<T>, UpdateOperations<T>, boolean, WriteConcern)
    xyz.morphia.query.Query.upperIndexBound(DBObject)
    use the methods that accept Options directly. This can be replicated using options.modifier("$max", new Document(...))
    xyz.morphia.query.QueryImpl.upperIndexBound(DBObject)
    xyz.morphia.query.Query.useReadPreference(ReadPreference)
    use the methods that accept Options directly
    xyz.morphia.query.QueryImpl.useReadPreference(ReadPreference)
    xyz.morphia.mapping.validation.MappingValidator.validate(Mapper, MappedClass)
  • Deprecated Constructors 
    Constructor and Description
    xyz.morphia.DatastoreImpl(Morphia, Mapper, MongoClient, String)
    This is not meant to be directly instantiated by end user code. Use Morphia.createDatastore(MongoClient, Mapper, String)
    xyz.morphia.DatastoreImpl(Morphia, MongoClient, String)
    This is not meant to be directly instantiated by end user code. Use Morphia.createDatastore(MongoClient, Mapper, String)
  • Deprecated Enum Constants 
    Enum Constant and Description
    xyz.morphia.query.FilterOperator.WITHIN
    New in server version 2.4: $geoWithin replaces $within which is deprecated.
  • Deprecated Annotation Type Elements 
    Annotation Type Element and Description
    xyz.morphia.annotations.Index.background
    use the IndexOptions found in Index.options()
    xyz.morphia.annotations.Indexed.background
    use the IndexOptions found in Indexed.options()
    xyz.morphia.annotations.Reference.concreteClass
    unimplemented
    xyz.morphia.annotations.Index.disableValidation
    use the IndexOptions found in Index.options()
    xyz.morphia.annotations.Index.dropDups
    this functionality is no longer supported on the server
    xyz.morphia.annotations.IndexOptions.dropDups
    Support for this has been removed from the server. This value is ignored.
    xyz.morphia.annotations.Indexed.dropDups
    Support for this has been removed from the server. This value is ignored.
    xyz.morphia.annotations.Index.expireAfterSeconds
    use the IndexOptions found in Index.options()
    xyz.morphia.annotations.Indexed.expireAfterSeconds
    use the IndexOptions found in Indexed.options()
    xyz.morphia.annotations.Index.name
    use the IndexOptions found in Index.options()
    xyz.morphia.annotations.Indexed.name
    use the IndexOptions found in Indexed.options()
    xyz.morphia.annotations.Index.sparse
    use the IndexOptions found in Index.options()
    xyz.morphia.annotations.Indexed.sparse
    use the IndexOptions found in Indexed.options()
    xyz.morphia.annotations.Index.unique
    use the IndexOptions found in Index.options()
    xyz.morphia.annotations.Indexed.unique
    use the IndexOptions found in Indexed.options()
    xyz.morphia.annotations.Index.value
    use Index.fields()
    xyz.morphia.annotations.Indexed.value
    use the IndexOptions found in Indexed.options()
